item.title: Python Coding Standards
item.author: wzdushu@gmail.com (wanzi)
item.description: Encoding declaration Default is not set to ASCII, can be set to Copy 1 # coding=<encoding name> or Copy 1 2 #!/usr/bin/python # -*- coding: <encoding name> -*- or Copy 1 2 #!/usr/bin/python # coding: utf-8 Code layout Four spaces per indentation, tabs are not recommended, and mixed tabs and spaces are not recommended A single line can be up to 79 characters long, backslashes can be used for line
